<template>
  <v-card max-width="800" class="mx-auto">
    <v-toolbar class="red lighten-4">
      <v-toolbar-title>Ajouter un nouveau message</v-toolbar-title>
    </v-toolbar>
    <v-form>
      <v-container>
        <v-row>
          <v-col md="6" offset-md="3">
            <v-text-field
              v-model="msgBody"
              label="Message"
              required
            ></v-text-field>
            <v-btn @click="submit">Soumettre</v-btn>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
      </v-container>
    </v-form>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>

export default {
  data() {
    return {
      msgBody: "",
    };
  },
  
  methods: {
    submit() {
      console.log(this.msgBody);
    },
  },
};
</script>
